attributes.action: Prevent Graeme Souness From Becoming The Next Manager Of Bolton Wanderers Football Club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Graeme Souness is rumoured to be the next Bolton manager. 

How on earth can anyone employ a manager who has fallen out with nearly every player he has ever managed and was gladly waved away from all clubs he's managed bar Glasgow Rangers??

He will turn the fans away and ruin our club.  Please help.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
